title: 模组BC跨服无法进入
author: 启点云计算
txt_content:

replies.author: DreamVoid
replies.txt_content:
模组服为什么不试一下WaterFall呢
https://papermc.io/downloads#Waterfall
WaterFall基于BungeeCord开发，理论支持BungeeCord全部插件和配置，（据说）是模组服专用代理端
